plugins.prepareCmd: CHART_NAME=$(grep '^name:' Chart.yaml | awk '{print $2}') && sed -i 's/^version:.*/version: ${nextRelease.version}/' Chart.yaml && awk '/name: common\.itsumi/{flag=1} flag && /version:/{gsub(/version: [0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+/, "version: ${nextRelease.version}")} /repository:/{flag=0} 1' starter-template/Chart.yaml.jinja > temp && mv temp starter-template/Chart.yaml.jinja && rm -f starter-template/charts/*.tgz && helm dependency update && helm package . && helm push "$CHART_NAME-${nextRelease.version}.tgz" oci://ghcr.io/$GITHUB_REPOSITORY_OWNER
